import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' import {v4 as uuidv4} from 'uuid' import {format} from 'date-fns' import AppointmentItem from '../AppointmentItem' const initialAppointmentList = [ { id: uuidv4, title: 'Dentist', date: '21 July 2021, Wednesday', }, ] class Appointments extends Component { state = {appointmentList: initialAppointmentList, title: '', date: ''} onChangeTitle = event => { const newTitle = event.target.value this.setState({title: newTitle}) } onChangeDate = event => { let newDate = event.target.value newDate = format(new Date(newDate), 'dd MMMM yyyy, EEEE') this.setState({date: newDate}) } addAppointment = () => { const {appointmentList, title, date} = this.state const newAppointment = { id: uuidv4, title, date, } this.setState(prevState => ({ appointmentList: [...prevState.appointmentList, newAppointment], })) } render() { const {appointmentList, title, date} = this.state console.log(title) return (
